quote: It didn't matter whether he was nearby or far away. His image would drift up into your mind just when you least expected it, shocking you, making your chest pound. Making your heart ache.
quote_letters: IT DIDNT MATTER WHETHER HE WAS NEARBY OR FAR AWAY HIS IMAGE WOULD DRIFT UP INTO YOUR MIND JUST WHEN YOU LEAST EXPECTED IT SHOCKING YOU MAKING YOUR CHEST POUND MAKING YOUR HEART ACHE
